commands.name: market
commands.desc: Search for the items from the marketplace, add items for sale and search from the list..
commands.usage:
/market <item name>
Search specific item

/market <page>
Change pages

/market sell {item name} * {price} each * {WORLD NAME}
/market sell {item name} * {price} per * {WORLD NAME}
Example of how to add new items to market, always put asteriks(*)

/market remove <item name>
Remove an item from your list

/market mylist
View your items at market

commands.name: greeting <disable> or <your message>
commands.desc: It will be sent to every new user joins to your server
commands.usage:
It will be sent to every new user joins to your server.
{user} is replaced with username and {server} is replaced with your server name.
